description: Like everything else in GNOME 3 it has been dumbed down to the point where it is almost useless.
summary: Not the good program it used to be

description: The usfullness of this tool can be disputed. There is dnf, gnome. GNOME Packages does not add anything to the list.
If you already have Gnome Software (or any of the DE's standard installers) with DNF, you don't need this software. And there is the fact that the software itself is just completely useless.

The Screen shot - which inspired me to install - showed on the left of the software list a structured list of programs by topic, eg. Internet, Editors, Multimedia. I also showed a text search box above both GUI elements.

The default "Gnome Software" program structures the apps likewise but its graphical, modern app store like approach is quite unpleasant to use for someone who really wants to dig into finding the ideal program.

Just imagine, when doing a search in "Gnome Software", scrolling down clicking on a program, clicking back: it will drop me to the top of the list.

This app instead offers me a list which I would get with a search in "yumex-dnf".

So, my conclusion is the same as other commentors.
summary: Screenshot suggests usefulness, app confirms uselessness

description: This seems to be installing an old (2009?) version of the application. As such it is literally a decade out of date.
Beware... you only have a search bar, you don't get any nice overview like in the screenshots.
summary: Doesn't look at all like the screenshots

description: Woul be nice if this app was close as screenshots show, but you have just a searchbar. You have to know what gnome driver you have to search to manage something...
Not what it used to be
Nice!! I loved it a lot

Incorrect screen shots of the package now, needs to be updated as all I see is a search box and then a list of what it found. No multi window layout showing categories and packages..

I find searching for packages works fine, but after that it is limited.

I could install a package by selecting it from search results listing, then click the install button, it then appears as an opened box icon indicating it had installed.

However removing anything it more difficult, it does not seem to remove anything.

Find a package you want to remove, select it, then click remove.
Or simply remove the ticks.
Then click apply changes button, expecting the packaged to be removed finally. But after this the packages are still installed.

REbooting and still the packages you expect to have gone are still there as installed.

This one is a very good package installer but you do need to know a bit about computers and what will work and what will not work as far as the packages and your computer. Some will work together and some will not work together and know what hardware your computer has. But I do wish that they had not removed the graphical groupings for users to better see what they are getting or installing.
I'm seeing that the last update was 2 years ago. I'm guessing that this has been replaced by GNOME Software?
Muy valioso,,,detalla la paqueteria o dependencias de cada programa instalado...nos da esa informacion basica de lo q tenemos instalado
Les atouts supplémentaires aux installations classiques , gnome paquet permet de voir plus de bibliothèque, il donne très facilement les fichiers installés pour un paquet
summary: très utile en complément de l'installeur Ubuntu Classique

description: Bien intégré à GNOME, sans bug (contrairement à la logithèque GNOME d'où je rédige cet avis), c'est un gestionnaire de paquets simple à prendre en main, qui fait son boulot sans être une usine à gaz

Aucun paquet n'a d'image ou d'icone.
On ne voit qu'une liste de texte sans aucune aide... Ubuntu propose bien mieux par défaut.
Curieux mais sous Ubuntu l'application est plus complete (identique à la page de présentation de Logiciels). Sous Fedora c'est d'un triste........

La pertinence des résultats est catastrophique.
Impossible de trier ou de filtrer (paquet installé ? depuis quand ?)
Les messages d'erreur ne s'affichent pas.

N'affiche pas la liste des fichiers dans le paquets si elle n'est pas installée (bon ça c'est pareil sur tous les logiciels APT*)

Encore un logiciel qui se veut simple et qui est en fait simpliste.

Rendez nous synaptic !
Перед скачиванием есть 2 скриншота программы которые по идее должны соответствовать программе которую скачаешь, но это не так.
